Looping_key3: Jab hum ek set of instructions bar-bar run karna chahe toh hum aise kar sakte hain:
Looping_key4:
Programming ka ek basic convention hai DON'T REPEAT YOURSELF (DRY)
Upar likha hua program DRY follow nahi karta. Dekhne mein bhi ye bahut sundar nahi lagta hai.
Looping_key5: Isi ko hum javascript mein *`loop`* ka use karke likh sakte hain.
Looping_key7: Upar likhe `code` ka wahi `output` hoga jo humne pehle dekha tha. Upar likha hua `code` apne aap ko repeat bhi nahi karta yani DRY hai.
Looping_key8: ke baare mein aur jaane ke liye
Looping_key11: `Loops` ko likhne ke liye kaafi tareeke hote hai. Aap koi bhi tareeka use kar sakte hai. Apni practice ke liye, jo program abhi humne uppar likha hai, uss same program ko for `loop`, while `loop`, for-in `loop` aur do-while `loop` se kare. In saare programs ka `output` same hona chahiye.
Looping_key12: Iss exercise ke liye aapko har program ko 20 mins mei finish karne ki koshish karni chahiye. `Code` likhte hi samajhne ki koshish karein ki yeh peechle likhe hue `loops` se kaise alag hai. Confusion ho toh aap iss exercise ko roz ek program likh kar 4 din mei bhi finish kar sakte hai.
Looping_key14: 4 alag-alag program likhe jo ek hi kaam ko *for* `loop`, *while* `loop`, *for-in `loop`* aur *do-while* `loop` se kare. In saare programs ka `output` same hona chahiye.
